page.title: 19Health in Norden
page.content: The nearest doctor's surgery to Norden is about a mile away. There are four doctors there who will go out on house calls within the area. They hold a clinic for pregnant women but have no special clinic for old people. The opening hours for the surgery are half past nine until quarter past ten in the morning and from three until five in the afternoon. In Shawfield School we all have a hygene test each term. The nurse comes in and looks at hair, nails etc. Everyone has a tuberculosis injection at the age of 10 or 11. Girls also have a rubella injection at the age of 11 or 12. A dentist comes in and looks at our teeth.
